model

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Card
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GameCard

    public abstract class Card
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class representing the concept of a playing card.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Card(boolean faceDown, Suit suit, Rank rank)
      Constructs a Card object, with the specified suit and rank.
